subtitle: We're having a workshop this month, and hopefully you will join us!
description: We're having a workshop this month, and hopefully you will join us!
title: WOULD YOU LIKE TO HELP IMPROVE OUR WEBSITE?
content:
Next week, the Girl Effect team will be in the Philippines! We want to be your favorite spot on the internet so to do that, we need to hear your voice!

We will have workshops in Manila on 11th and 12th June from 9am to 3pm. For workshops in Manila, we are looking for readers of Girl Effect aged thirteen to seventeen years of age (13-17 years old) who are currently enrolled in school.

We also have workshops in Cebu on 7th and 8th June from 9am to 3pm. For workshops in Cebu, we are looking for readers of the Girl Effect aged thirteen to seventeen years of age (13-17 years old) that are currently not enrolled in school.

Those selected to attend the workshop will be given assistance for transportation and food, and will receive a thank you gift at the end of our session.

If you fit our criteria, and are interested in joining us, please [click here][1] to apply or send an email to us at philippines@girleffect.org.



  [1]: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1RZguFxNQTEEvEqM30OMwE21-LeTuUzHLkFel0IwCT2w/viewform?c=0&w=1
